reviews.name: Seville Classics 5-Tier Shelving System, SHE18370BZ
reviews.reviewText: Great item. Took me a little less than 2 hours to assemble. Looks fantastic in my kitchen. Chrome finish is shiny and beautiful. The shelves are heavy and substantial. The wheels make it easy to move around. Would highly recommend this product.
reviews.title: Sturdy and solid shelving

reviews.name: Seville Classics 5-Tier Shelving System, SHE18370BZ
reviews.reviewText: I had the plastic 5 tier shelves which don't have wheels. When ever I had to move it I would have to take things off of the shelves and rearrange everything. It was used in a basement closet where the sewer guy needed to get to an access panel. This is so much easier and sturdier. The wheels glide with ease and lock if needed.
reviews.title: Perfect for mobility

reviews.name: Seville Classics 5-Tier Shelving System, SHE18370BZ
reviews.reviewText: This shelving system is very sturdy, functional, and esthetic. It was simple to put together and not too expensive. I would (and will) buy another one!
reviews.title: Excellent product!

reviews.name: Seville Classics 5-Tier Shelving System, SHE18370BZ
reviews.reviewText: This shelving system works very nicely in my laundry room. Sturdy and fairly attractive, it was easy enough to assemble, though I would recommend two people for the job to make leveling easier. I didn't put the casters on it, although they were of high quality. Provides ample space for storage. I recommend.
reviews.title: Nice Rack!

reviews.name: Seville Classics 5-Tier Shelving System, SHE18370BZ
reviews.reviewText: I would never have gotten the components screwed together if I hadn't dosed them good with 3in1 oil. The screw threads were not well matched. And I would never have gotten the components screwed together if I'd put on the wheels first as the directions said. Obviously who ever wrote the directions had never put one together before.
reviews.title: Assembly directions were terrible
